attributes.title: scared
attributes.review: ok so like i was just scrolling thru the info from our outstanding president, reading the articles and educating myself on his plans for this year’s election. but when i went to “events” it asked for my location... i said no of course cuz i always do with everything and it just kept saying “to use this app we need to see your location” and then gave me an option to open my settings, I PRESSED CANCEL. but then it just kept asking and asking and i just kept clicking no and cancel and it kept asking and i just started to get confused. so i exited the app but somehow the banner to “view my location” still kept popping up everywhere i went on my phone. i thought it was maybe time for my phone to say goodbye but then i remembered i just got it only a year ago. so i restarted it to see if that would help. as soon as i turned on my phone i kept getting messages blowing up one after another from the phone number that usually texts you updates. it was really mind bogging so i tried to figure it out but they wouldn’t just stop texting me. i texted stop to the number. but then it CALLS me. i didn’t wanna answer i really didn’t want to. but there was no red button option to end the call. i answered but i didn’t say anything. all i heard was screaming little girls and the room sounded kind of echoing like a cell or some sort. idk what was going on there but i didn’t only hear the screaming, there was crying, banging, clashing, like what you can imagine what hell would sound like. i just started shaking and then i was soaked in a pile of sweat and i just threw my phone to the ground and stomped on it until it shattered into little bits and pieces. i later threw it into a pit of fire. i’m now using my old 6+ but i’m just glad that whatever happened stopped happening. i’m gonna take a while to recover from this though. PLEASE DONT GET THIS APP!!! #trumpterrorsurvivor
